snippet.title: TRAILER - HIVE: Altenum Wars is coming to PS4
snippet.description:
Available on PlayStation 4 next May 1st 2018

HIVE: Altenum Wars is a multiplayer hero shooter in 2.5D side scrolling with a gameplay based on fights between two teams of five players each. We play the role of the best fighters of the different factions that exist in the game lore: human military (UFG), humans modified by altenum (NHC), robots (EVO), and evolved aliens (YILL). Choose from three online game modes:

- Team Deathmatch - Get the highest number of enemy kills in a team fight.
- King of the Hill - Teams must conquer and defend one of three different strategic points scattered across the map.
- Survival - Offline mode. The hero faces waves of enemies.


------------------------------------------------------------------

Press Kit: http://presskit.catnessgames.com
Contact: info@catnessgames.com

Follow us on:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CatnessGames 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/catnessgames
